Pn : 1.0000000000000000 + 2.0000000000000000*x + 3.0000000000000000*x^{2}
Naif : P_n(10.0000000000000000)=321.0000000000000000
Horner : P_n(10.0000000000000000)=321.0000000000000000
b : { 321.0000000000000000, 32.0000000000000000, 3.0000000000000000 }
Dérivées : { 3.0000000000000000, 32.0000000000000000, 642.0000000000000000 }
